Comments_List: As this was my first anthropology course, it provided a full base of important readings. We analyzed the readings with an (obviously) anthro lens, which was very helpful for me.

The readings were amazing. Only weakness is that if students choose not to engage, they can get by with doing nothing during the seminar. it would be good to find a way to get more participation in class
Yes, it was a very well-conceived course. Wide variety of topics, approached from a range of different genres, with strong intellectual foundation.
